mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, p.cid, c.name, c.upid, p.regdate, p.stock, p.imgname, p.description FROM product p INNER JOIN cate c ON p.cid=c.id
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, p.cid, c.name AS catename, c.upid, p.regdate, p.stock, p.imgname, p.description FROM product p INNER JOIN cate c ON p.cid=c.id WHERE cid=#{cid}
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, p.cid, c.name AS catename, c.upid, p.regdate, p.stock, p.imgname, p.description FROM product p INNER JOIN cate c ON p.cid=c.id WHERE c.upid=#{upid}

insert.if: INSERT INTO product VALUES (NULL, #{name}, #{price}, #{cid}, CURDATE(), #{stock}, NULL, #{description})

mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name=#{name}, price=#{price}, cid=#{cid}, stock=#{stock}, imgname=#{imgname}, description=#{description} WHERE id=#{id}
